Package com.example.househomey.utils

Class FragmentUtils

java.lang.Object
com.example.househomey.utils.FragmentUtils
public class FragmentUtils extends Object
This is a utility class for fragment page navigation within an Android application.
Author:
Owen Cooke, Matthew Neufeld

  • Method Details

    • navigateToFragmentPage

      public static void navigateToFragmentPage(android.content.Context context, androidx.fragment.app.Fragment page)
      Navigates to a specified fragment page by replacing the fragment within the provided AppCompatActivity's fragment container.
      Parameters:
      context - The AppCompatActivity instance used for accessing the FragmentManager.
      page - The Fragment to navigate to and replace the current fragment with.

    • navigateToFragmentPage

      public static void navigateToFragmentPage(android.content.Context context, androidx.fragment.app.Fragment page, @IdRes int fragmentContainer)
      Navigates to a specified fragment page by replacing the fragment within the provided AppCompatActivity's fragment container.
      Parameters:
      context - The AppCompatActivity instance used for accessing the FragmentManager.
      page - The Fragment to navigate to and replace the current fragment with.
      fragmentContainer - The parent container of the old fragment which will contain the new one.

    • navigateHomeWithIndicator

      public static void navigateHomeWithIndicator(android.content.Context context)
      Specialized method for navigating back to the HomeFragment while also setting the selected item in the BottomNavigationView
      Parameters:
      context - The AppCompatActivity context from which the navigation is initiated.

    • goBack

      public static void goBack(android.content.Context context)
      Navigates the fragment manager back to the previous fragment if there is a fragment in the back stack.
      Parameters:
      context - The AppCompatActivity context where the navigation is called.

      public static com.google.android.material.datepicker.MaterialDatePicker<Long> createDatePicker()
      Enables date picking for the calendar
      Returns:
      datePicker

    • formatDate

      public static String formatDate(Date date)
      Formats given date as a string in "yyyy-MM-dd" format.
      Parameters:
      date - date to be formatted
      Returns:
      formatted date

    • makeChip

      public static com.google.android.material.chip.Chip makeChip(String label, Boolean closeIconVisibility, com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup chipGroup, android.content.Context context, int backgroundColour, int strokeColour, int textColour, boolean checkable)
      Makes a chip and adds it to a chip group
      Parameters:
      label - label that will go on the chip
      closeIconVisibility - boolean: if true, closeIcon is visible, if false, not visible
      chipGroup - group of chips the chip will be added to
      context - the given context
      backgroundColour - background colour of the chip
      strokeColour - stroke colour of the chip
      textColour - text colour of the chip
      Returns:
      a new chip

    • makeChip

      public static com.google.android.material.chip.Chip makeChip(String label, Boolean closeIconVisibility, com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup chipGroup, android.content.Context context, int backgroundColour, int strokeColour, int textColour)
      uses MakeChip to make a new chip
      Parameters:
      label - label that will go on the chip
      closeIconVisibility - boolean: if true, closeIcon is visible, if false, not visible
      chipGroup - group of chips the chip will be added to
      context - the given context
      backgroundColour - background colour of the chip
      strokeColour - stroke colour of the chip
      textColour - text colour of the chip
      Returns:
      a chip provided by makeChip

    • isValidUUID

      public static boolean isValidUUID(String str)
      Determines whether a string is a valid UUID or not. Used for Cloud Storage image UUIDs.
      Parameters:
      str - a string

    • deletePhotosFromCloud

      public static void deletePhotosFromCloud(android.content.Context context, List<String> photoIds)
      Deletes photos from Firebase Cloud Storage based on the user and provided list of photo IDs.
      Parameters:
      context - The context associated with the Firebase storage operations.
      photoIds - A list of photo IDs (UUIDs) representing the image filenames to be deleted.

    • navigateViaBottomNavBar

      public static void navigateViaBottomNavBar(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment fragmentToShow, android.content.Context context)
      Navigates to fragment without adding it to back stack, this is for moving between the 3 primary fragments on the bottom navbar
      Parameters:
      fragmentToShow - page to navigate to
      context - The AppCompatActivity context where the navigation is called

    • initialCase

      public static String initialCase(String label)
      Takes an unformatted string and converts it to initial case
      Parameters:
      label - the unformatted label
      Returns:
      the formatted label
